descriptionHtml:
Brief overview:
The aim of this mod is to improve the effects of the Standing Stones and the Aetherial Artifacts in a way that makes them compliment one another while offering new advantages and challenges to gameplay in a balanced, powerful and lore-friendly way.


[center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/86470/?][img]http://www.imageupload.co.uk/images/2018/04/15/ZDI.png[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/81036/?][img]http://www.imageupload.co.uk/images/2018/04/15/ZIA.png[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/83444/?][img]http://www.imageupload.co.uk/images/2018/04/15/ZFE.png[/img][/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/90735][img]http://www.imageupload.co.uk/images/2018/04/15/ZASS.png[/img][/url][/center]


[font=Arial][center][img]http://www.imageupload.co.uk/images/2018/04/15/INTRODUCTION.png[/img]
[color=#f9cb9c][size=3][b]The aim of this mod is to improve the effects of the Standing Stones and the Aetherial Artifacts in a way that makes them compliment one another while offering new advantages and challenges to gameplay in a balanced, powerful, simple and lore-friendly way.[/b][/size][/color]

[size=3][b][color=#f6b26b]New Blessings[/color][/b][/size]
The Guardian Stones offer more powerful abilities at the cost of a slight weakness.
The Charge Stones offer more powerful abilities and a Greater Power, but at the cost of a more significant weakness.
The Serpent Stone randomly grants a different Greater Power every day and has no associated weaknesses.

[size=3][b][color=#f6b26b]Improved Aetherial Artifacts[/color][/b][/size]
Smoother usability of the Aetherial Crown with the Standing Stones has been implemented.
The Aetherial Shield and Staff have new enchantments designed to work with the Standing Stone blessings.
Ebony and quicksilver variants of all three artifacts are available for construction.

[size=3][b][color=#f6b26b]Requirements and Compatibility[/color][/b][/size]
Dawnguard required. No other mods or DLCs are required to use this mod, and it's fully compatible with all my mods. Mods like Andromeda and Aurora, which also amend the Standing Stones, will be incompatible. Standing Stones added by other mods to new locations (e.g. new player homes) will have their mesh files replaced and will look strange, but this is to ensure a smooth installation and the option to uninstall bug-free. They will also still grant you the vanilla blessings, so for a balanced playthrough I'd recommend avoiding them.
[/center]


[center][img]http://www.imageupload.co.uk/images/2018/04/15/THESTONES.png[/img]
[color=#f9cb9c][size=3][b]The Standing Stones of Skyrim now offer consistent, powerful and balanced blessings that I've created based on in-game effects from various Elder Scrolls games and lore descriptions of the constellations and the powers associated with them.[/b][/size][/color]

The blessings of the Guardian Stones and their Charges now include updated passive abilities that are more powerful but come at the cost of weaknesses. The Charge Stones (i.e. all Stones except the Guardians and the Serpent) have the greatest weaknesses, but they also grant Greater Powers for use once a day. The Serpent Stone is unusual and has an effect unique amongst the Standing Stones.

When you first load this mod, your current blessing will be detected and replaced with the new blessing, so no new playthrough is required to run this mod. As a new feature, if you try to receive a blessing you already have, you will be given the option to remove the blessing.

[b][size=3][color=#f6b26b]PRESS THE SPOILER BUTTON BELOW TO VIEW
ALL CHANGES TO THE STANDING STONE BLESSINGS[/color][/size][/b][/center]
[spoiler][size=2]
[center][b][color=#e06666][size=5]The Warrior[/size][/color][/b]
Your combat skills are 20% more effective and increase
20% faster. Magic and stealth skills increase 20% slower.

[b][color=#e06666][size=5]The Lady[/size][/color][/b]
Increases your stamina by 150 points and lowers the
cost of sprinting. Reduces Frost Resistance by 100%.
[b][color=#e06666][size=4]Greater Power: Lady's Endurance[/size][/color][/b]
Rapidly regenerates stamina for 60 seconds.

[b][color=#e06666][size=5]The Lord[/size][/color][/b]
Increases Frost Resistance and the strength of your armor
by 50%. Reduces Fire Resistance by 100%.
[b][color=#e06666][size=4]Greater Power: Lord's Vigor[/size][/color][/b]
Rapidly regenerates health for 30 seconds.

[b][color=#e06666][size=5]The Steed[/size][/color][/b]
Worn armor is weightless and speed is increased by
10 points. You are 70% easier to detect when sneaking.
[b][color=#e06666][size=4]Greater Power: Steed's Celerity[/size][/color][/b]
Increases the speed and staggering power of your weapon
attacks for 60 seconds.

[b][color=#93c47d][size=5]The Thief[/size][/color][/b]
Your stealth skills are 20% more effective and increase
20% faster. Combat and magic skills increase 20% slower.

[b][color=#93c47d][size=5]The Lover[/size][/color][/b]
Increases your chance of inflicting critical hits and dodging
attacks by 25%. Reduces Poison Resistance by 100%.
[b][color=#93c47d][size=4]Greater Power: Lover's Kiss[/size][/color][/b]
Paralyzes nearby people for up to 10 seconds.

[b][color=#93c47d][size=5]The Shadow[/size][/color][/b]
Allows you to move silently and inflict 100% more sneak
damage. Spells and armor offer 70% less protection.
[b][color=#93c47d][size=4]Greater Power: Shadow's Veil[/size][/color][/b]
You move unseen 30 seconds.

[b][color=#93c47d][size=5]The Tower[/size][/color][/b]
Bartering, lockpicking and pickpocketing are 50% easier.
Persuasion attempts are much harder.
[b][color=#93c47d][size=4]Greater Power: Tower's Ward[/size][/color][/b]
Reflects 20% of incoming physical damage back on the
attacker for 60 seconds.

[b][color=#6d9eeb][size=5]The Mage[/size][/color][/b]
Your magic skills are 20% more effective and increase 20%
faster. Combat and stealth skills increase 20% slower.

[b][color=#6d9eeb][size=5]The Apprentice[/size][/color][/b]
Increases your magicka and magicka regeneration by
100 points. Reduces Magic Resistance by 100%.
[b][color=#6d9eeb][size=4]Greater Power: Apprentice's Tenacity[/size][/color][/b]
Rapidly regenerates magicka for 60 seconds.

[b][color=#6d9eeb][size=5]The Atronach[/size][/color][/b]
Increases your magicka by 150 points and absorbs 30%
of incoming spells. Prevents magicka regeneration.
[b][color=#6d9eeb][size=4]Greater Power: Atronach's Appetency[/size][/color][/b]
Absorbs all incoming spells for 30 seconds.

[b][color=#6d9eeb][size=5]The Ritual[/size][/color][/b]
Grants you a unique Master spell.
Reduces Shock Resistance by 100%.
The new Master spells you can receive are listed below.
[b][color=#6d9eeb][size=4]Greater Power: Ritual's Embedment[/size][/color][/b]
For up to 60 seconds, you are protected from staggering
and casting a ritual spell costs no magicka.

[b][color=#6d9eeb][size=5]Ritual Spells[/size][/color][/b]
When you receive the blessing of the Ritual, you will have the option
to choose one of the five new Master spells listed below:

[b][color=#8e7cc3]Ritual of Galvanization[/color][/b]
School: Alteration
Base cost: 1191
Effect: Improves the caster's armor rating and Shock Resistance by 120 points for 120 seconds.

[b][color=#6fa8dc]Ritual of Reanimation[/color][/b]
School: Conjuration
Base cost: 3475
Effect: Reanminates nearby corpses to fight for your for 180 seconds.
This is very similar to the vanilla power of the Ritual Stone, except it's a spell rather than a Greater Power.

[b][color=#b4a7d6]Ritual of Electrocution[/color][/b]
School: Destruction
Base cost: 2488
Effect: Electrocutes nearby targets with 200 points of shock damage to Health and half that to Magicka.
This effect benefits from the perks of other shock damaging spells, and like the Lightning Storm spell, it will disintegrate anyone it kills.

[b][color=#9fc5e8]Ritual of Discretion[/color][/b]
School: Illusion
Base cost: 1442
Effect: Prevents creatures and people from casting spells for 60 seconds.
If you have the Master of the Mind perk, this will affect automatons, daedra and the undead as well.

[b][color=#a2c4c9]Ritual of Consecration[/color][/b]
School: Restoration
Base cost: 1424
Effect: Restores your health. For 60 seconds, burns nearby undead and sends them fleeing up to level 30.
This effect will also fully restore your stamina if you have the Respite perk.

[b][color=#93c47d][size=5]The Serpent[/size][/color][/b]
Every day, you can cast a randomly selected Greater Power from one of the other Standing Stones. It's also possible to receive a unique Greater Power called Serpent's Strike, which for 30 seconds will allow you to spit a corrosive poison that damages health and lowers armor rating for 5 seconds.
[/center][/size][/spoiler]
